mapper.sql: YSID, YSTIME, YSUSERNAME, BMCODE, LDCODE, SSNY, YHID, SBSL, SBGR, LDZH, CJSL, YSSL, HGSL, SLFHL, ZLHGL, YXSL, YXGR
mapper.insert: insert into hmglyh.RCYH_ZYYSJLB (YSID, YSTIME, YSUSERNAME, BMCODE, LDCODE, SSNY, YHID, SBSL, SBGR, LDZH, CJSL, YSSL, HGSL, SLFHL, ZLHGL, YXSL, YXGR) values (#{ysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{ystime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{ysusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssny,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sbgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ldzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yssl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hgsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{slfhl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zlhgl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yxsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yxgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into hmglyh.RCYH_ZYYSJLB
YSID,
YSTIME,
YSUSERNAME,
BMCODE,
LDCODE,
SSNY,
YHID,
SBSL,
SBGR,
LDZH,
CJSL,
YSSL,
HGSL,
SLFHL,
ZLHGL,
YXSL,
YXGR,
#{ysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_date(#{ystime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{ysusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ldcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ssny,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sbsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sbgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ldzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cjsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{yssl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{hgsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{slfhl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{zlhgl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{yxsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{yxgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select: select count(*) from RCYH_ZYYSJLB where bmcode = #{ysbmcode} and ldcode = #{ldcode} and yhid = #{yhid} and ystime >= to_date(#{starttime},'yyyy-mm-dd') and ystime <= to_date(#{endtime},'yyyy-mm-dd')
mapper.update:
update hmglyh.RCYH_ZYYSJLB
YSTIME = to_date(#{ystime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
YSUSERNAME = #{ysusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BMCODE = #{bmcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LDCODE = #{ldcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSNY = #{ssny,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YHID = #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBSL = #{sbsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SBGR = #{sbgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LDZH = #{ldzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJSL = #{cjsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YSSL = #{yssl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HGSL = #{hgsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SLFHL = #{slfhl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZLHGL = #{zlhgl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YXSL = #{yxsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YXGR = #{yxgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where YSID = #{ysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update hmglyh.RCYH_ZYYSJLB set YSTIME = to_date(#{ystime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), YSUSERNAME = #{ysusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMCODE = #{bmcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LDCODE = #{ldcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSNY = #{ssny,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHID = #{yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SBSL = #{sbsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SBGR = #{sbgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LDZH = #{ldzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJSL = #{cjsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YSSL = #{yssl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HGSL = #{hgsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SLFHL = #{slfhl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZLHGL = #{zlhgl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YXSL = #{yxsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YXGR = #{yxgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where YSID = #{ysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
